quote_first: I sit by the window, crunching toast, sipping coffee, and leafing through the paper in a leisurely way. At last, after devouring three slices, two cups of coffee, and all the Saturday sections, I stretch my arms in a big yawn and glance at the clock. I don't believe it. It's only
title: The Undomestic Goddess
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote_first: The Castle Gate - only the Castle Gate - and it was
title: Buddenbrooks
author: Thomas Mann
